some russian kid threatened to rape and kill my family

If you want the CS 1.6 experience, but you think it's so old to play, this is your game. As a player who played all of the Counter-Strike games including cs, cs cz, css [this game] and csgo, this is my definite favourite. It's pretty modern, compared to the elder games and definitely better than cs:go because it uses the system of the elder games. With it's cheap price, fun and competitive gameplay, it is DEFINITELY worth it.
